subject: Steroids
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Tests on seven backup urine samples taken from Floyd Landis at the 2006 Tour de France have revealed traces of synthetic testosterone, according to a report Monday by a French newspaper.
snippet: Tests on seven backup urine samples taken from Floyd Landis at the 2006 Tour de France have revealed traces of synthetic testosterone, according to a report Monday by a French newspaper.
